messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Marty's Birthday
messages.messageBody:
<< Awww...nuts. You mean that I already had mine? I was born on June 2 :o)
Can't say
I remember it much....

My boys have a little bit of time, Jason was born on the 9th and Kyle on the
18th.

Stephanie E.>>


Mine was extra special. It was on the 28th and I always had a big problem
with birthdays. Just my own of course. Never liked the idea of getting older
and it really bothered me. But when I was 28 on the 28th, I had my first
baby with me and it didn't matter one bit how old I was turning. 28 was just
wonderful then, and so far so has 38 and soon looking forward to 48!!!!

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Marty's Birthday
messages.msgSnippet: ...  Yeah right, two of mine already had theirs on the 2nd
messages.messageBody:
>From: starsuncloud@...

<<Then it's his Golden Birthday, everyone gets just one of those!! At least
he'll remember it.....>>

Yeah right, two of mine already had theirs on the 2nd and 4th. They just
didn't really get it!!!! The next two will understand "much better" as my
baby says. They can wait until the 17th and the 26th.

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Marty's Birthday
messages.msgSnippet: ... In my family, it has always been referred to as a person s STAR birthday.  We all strive to have children born later in a month, so that they can really
messages.messageBody:
> << He will be fourteen on the fourteenth, and that won't ever happen again! >>
>
> Then it's his Golden Birthday, everyone gets just one of those!! At least
> he'll remember it.....

In my family, it has always been referred to as a person's "STAR"
birthday. We all strive to have children born later in a month, so that
they can really celebrate their Star birthday!

-Lisa
